meanings.definition: A person who uses teasels to raise the nap on cloth.
meanings.sent1: The teaselers carefully worked on the fabric to make it softer.
meanings.sent2: The teaselers in the textile factory were skilled at their craft.
meanings.sent3: The teaselers joked that they were 'nap experts' due to their job.
meanings.sent4: The teaselers were like artists, sculpting the fabric's surface with precision.
meanings.sent5: The teaselers transformed the cloth, giving it a velvety feel.

meanings.definition: A machine used for teaseling cloth.
meanings.sent1: The old teaselers in the factory were still in good working condition.
meanings.sent2: The teaselers hummed as they smoothed out the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The teaselers machine seemed to have a mind of its own, dancing around the cloth.
meanings.sent4: The teaselers roared to life, ready to enhance the fabric's texture.
meanings.sent5: The teaselers machine whirred, bringing life back to the worn-out cloth.

meanings.sent1: The teaselers of the past took great pride in their meticulous work.
meanings.sent2: Teaselers require a gentle touch to achieve the desired effect on the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The teaselers process was like a delicate dance between fabric and tool.
meanings.sent4: The teaselers transformed the plain cloth into a luxurious material.
meanings.sent5: The teaselers' technique was crucial in creating high-quality textiles.
